snippet.title: Tethered | E3 2016  trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing Tethered - Secret Sorcery’s magical VR debut. A simple, unique and completely immersive strategy game that physically AND emotionally tethers you to the world you’re striving to return balance to. Coming to PlayStation VR Fall 2016.

http://www.tetheredgame.com

Like Tethered on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/tetheredgame

Follow Secret Sorcery on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/secretsorcery
